content: {"name": " Crossroads of Michigan", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Tuesday - Friday visit main office for appointment : 2424 West Grand Boulevard Detroit, MI 48208 ", "email": "", "url": "http://www.crossroadsofmichigan.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "14641 East Jefferson Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Riverbend", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48215", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3742594, "longitude": -82.94162709999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 822-5200", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
